title: How do you do damage to the ocean week monters?
body: Someone tell me how to damage ocean week monsters

replies.body: We're currently investigating an issue that appears to be delaying or preventing some players from being able to earn Ocean Week points. I'll post more updates here when I have them!

We've found the cause of the issue and we're currently working on a resolution. The fix might take some time, but you should get any points that you noticed missing during today. This issue should not have any impact on earning your rewards.
Any further updates? I don't mind the delayed points/rewards but playing without the IP boost is depressing

> [{quoted}](name=Dethmind,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=HRxqvPlr,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2017-01-26T21:43:54.513+0000)
>
> Any further updates? I don't mind the delayed points/rewards but playing without the IP boost is depressing

This should have come through for you now - we fixed up the issues that were occuring with the delayed points early in the morning. Let me know if you're still seeing incorrect points or missing your IP boost!
I mean i got my 4 win IP boost, so it's probably slowly being rolled out.

FYI same thing happening to me - have won one ARAM and one normal (SR) and have no wins registered. Also have not received the IP boost.

Thanks.

The points that you should have earned early this morning should now updated correctly - and you should have received the IP boost if you signed up before the event started. Let me know if you're still having problems!
Thanks Zaps - much appreciated!
I signed up a few days ago to the homegaurds. Haven't received any ocean week points or a 4 Win IP boost either. Not really fussed but thought it might help you guys out.
We've put in a fix to make sure the points from this morning have been updated correctly. You should also have recieved the IP boost as well - let me know if this is still not right for you!
Any update to this? I'm still on 0 points.

We've just fixed up the games that go through early this morning. You should have the right number of points now if you signed up before you did your games... let me know if it's still not correct for you!

Mine is still incorrect.

I'm on 8 points when i should be on 16. The points i played after midnight didn't count, only the games i played when i woke up counted.

I'm seeing that you have 8, but should have 14 (one was just before the start of the event from the times that I'm seeing) - I've passed this along to help us track this down, and we should hopefully be able to fix it up!

The game that you are referring to finished at like 12:20-12:30 am AEDT. 

However if you require game start to be after 12 am than I don't mind.

Any ETA to when it will be fixed?

No confirmed ETA at the moment - we're still tracking down the exact reason why it's still incorrect. I'll make sure that you don't miss out on any point-related rewards in the mean time while we work on fixing it for all players impacted!
Fixed now :)

Same. My missing points are now showing!

Thanks Zaps, you the man!
Games that you win from now on should earn you points. We are still working on getting everyone the points they are missing from earlier in the day.

[Once you've signed up - you just need to win a game of League of Legends. ](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017) Each time you win a match made game you'll deal a point of damage to the monster (two if you're playing on the bonus map for the day) - and the community is working together to beat each monster!
I have just won a match but it doesnt say i have taken any hp of the kiwi?
We've just fixed up the games that didn't process correctly this morning. You should have the right number of points from last night now - please let me know if this still not right for you.
Try giving it some time and checking back later. It might just be taking a bit to register properly on the servers.
Same happening to me.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=HRxqvPlr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-26T13:57:38.267+0000)
>
> [Once you've signed up - you just need to win a game of League of Legends. ](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/oceanweek-2017) Each time you win a match made game you'll deal a point of damage to the monster (two if you're playing on the bonus map for the day) - and the community is working together to beat each monster!

Question when it says you need say 20 points for the bonus hextech chest. Does that count the "Double points" would winning ten games on the map with bonus points be sufficient or would you have to win 20 total?
Yep - ten games with the bonus would earn you twenty points, which would be enough for the bonus hextech chest + key at the end of the event!
Thanks
